definition: after all/to investigate/to study carefully/Taiwan pr. [jiu4]

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The researchers found that higher scores on a measure of chronic loneliness were associated with an increase in warmer baths or showers.
sentences.chinese: 研究者发现较高分的慢性寂寞和温度较高的洗浴有关。

sentences.english: Through microscopic observations researchers identified up to 61 morphospecies.
sentences.chinese: 研究者通过显微镜的观察鉴定了总共61个变种。

sentences.english: The lurgy in question was, the researchers suggest, imported from Australia.
sentences.chinese: 研究者认为，这种疾病是从澳大利亚传入的。

sentences.english: While blockbusters may still be far off, researchers are laying foundations for discovery.
sentences.chinese: 重大突破可能还为时尚早，研究者还处于打基础阶段。

sentences.english: The researchers note that there may be as many as 70 active compounds in bitter melon.
sentences.chinese: 研究者表示苦瓜中至少含有70种活性物质。

sentences.english: As alternative approaches, the electrocatalysis methods, as environmental friendly and green technologies, are gradually concerned by investigators of late years.
sentences.chinese: 电催化法因绿色环保近年来逐渐受到研究者的关注。

sentences.english: The researchers measured how many responses they received by each type of postcard.
sentences.chinese: 研究者们分析了人们对于不同明信片的回复数量。

sentences.english: Scrub jays can trick you, researchers say.
sentences.chinese: 研究者发现，灌木丛里的鸟儿也能把你骗到。

sentences.english: As the original trail has not existed for a long time, the researchers mostly use the tablet rubbings as their basis.
sentences.chinese: 碑之原迹早已不存，研究者大多是以拓本摩本为据。

sentences.english: Since then a great deal of research has been focused on acrylamide.
sentences.chinese: 从这以后，很多研究者将目光转移到丙烯酰胺。

sentences.english: The results of this first experiment supported the researchers’ hypothesis.
sentences.chinese: 第一个实验的结果支持了研究者的假设。

sentences.english: They tested their hypothesis in a series of experiments on mice.
sentences.chinese: 研究者们在对老鼠的一些列实验中检验了他们的假说。

sentences.english: The Japanese researchers isolated proteins from bacteria in sewage.
sentences.chinese: 日本研究者从下水道污物中分离出蛋白质。

sentences.english: Doctors and researchers are working to develop a vaccine for Alzheimer's disease.
sentences.chinese: 医生和研究者致力于阿尔茨海默病疫苗的研究。

sentences.english: The researchers studied the behaviour of female brown capuchin monkeys. They look cute.
sentences.chinese: 研究者们对雌性棕色卷尾猴的行为进行了研究。

sentences.english: The researchers then reanalyzed existing data on crocodiles in the open ocean.
sentences.chinese: 研究者再次分析了在海上的鳄鱼的数据。

definition: research/a study/CL:項|项[xiang4]/to research/to look into
subject (in an experiment)/participant (in a clinical trial etc)
